sections.heading: Repealed.Section 1-23-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:Laws 1987, ch. 160, § 1; repealed by Laws 2018, ch. 79, § 175.

Repeals.— Laws 2018, ch. 79, § 175 repealed 1-23-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1987, ch. 160, § 1, relating to the short title of the Mail Ballot Election Act, effective July 1, 2018. For provisions of former section,seethe 2017 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
